text: Epipsestis medialis is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It is found in Nepal. The wingspan is 34–37 mm. The forewings are pale grey, with its median area dark blackish grey. The hindwings are pale whitish grey., 1982: Notes on the Genus Epipsestis, with Descriptions of Three New Species from Nepal (Lepidoptera: Thyatiridae). Tyô to Ga 32 (3-4): 117-137. title: Epipsestis medialis
